info.title: V2 APIs
info.description: The V2 APIs of Bitpack.me provide better developer experience. If you're still on V1 of APIs we request you to start working on upgrading to V2 APIs.

post.description: Sends OTP to the email address provided. There can be a maximum of 3 OTP attempts every 5 minutes.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address to which we need to send OTP.

post.description:
Verifies the OTP for an email address. Upon successful verification, creates a logged in session at the backend and sends a JWT token as response. This token must be added to the request header in each authenticated  
request.

For refresh token there is a key that is available in the response as `refreshToken` which will be used in fetching a new token in refresh token api call.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address at which OTP was send

parameters.name: otp
parameters.description: OTP

post.description:
Verifies the OTP for an email address. Upon successful verification, creates a logged in session at the backend and sends a JWT token as response. This token must be added to the request header in each authenticated  
request.

For refresh token there is a key that is available in the response as `refreshToken` which will be used in fetching a new token in refresh token api call.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address at which OTP was send

parameters.name: otp
parameters.description: OTP

get.description:
Fetch all NFTs in the system. Pagination and sorting is available.

Multiple Query params are available to filter the response as per need. Please check Params section for Query options.

collection.name: Second Collection
collection.description: Fist Collection to be used in BitPack.me

post.description: Save NFT of the User with tags and Collection details.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title of the NFT.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Nft Description. ( Not mandatory )

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: Price of the tags. To be saved in paise. Value of 100 means 1 INR.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Url of the Nft fetch from Cloudinary.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma separated ID of tags. ( Not mandatory )

parameters.name: royalty
parameters.description: Percentage of Royalty coming from Sales that goes to the creator(s). This is expressed in basis points (1 - 10000)

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: Quantity of the Nft copies.

parameters.name: forSale
parameters.description: For Sale value of NFT. (boolean) Default=False ( Not mandatory )

parameters.name: royaltyToOwner
parameters.description: The share of sales that will go to curr Owner of the NFT. Expressed in basis points (0 - 10000). If there is no owner, this goes to creator.

parameters.name: royaltyToPrevOwner
parameters.description: The share of sales that will go to prev owner. Expressed in basis points (0 - 10000). If there is no previous owner, then this goes to the current owner. If there is no current owner, this goes to creator.

parameters.name: animation
parameters.description: An animation URL of the NFT

parameters.name: externalUrl
parameters.description: An external URL that could represent the game or anything else

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: An arbitrary set of properties. They must be valid JSON

parameters.name: creatorShare
parameters.description: The share of splits that goes in between creators. The sum should be 10000 basis points.

collection.name: thirdCollection21
collection.description: Fist Collection to be used in BitPack.me

errors.msg: Bad Request, Collection not owned by user.

post.description: This endpoint is to create Collections for the logged in User.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the Collection.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the collection.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Url of the collection image stored in cloudinary.

application/json.name: thirdCollection2
application/json.description: Fist Collection to be used in BitPack.me

get.description:
Fetch collections. By default it fetches 100 collections orders by DESC on Id.

Multiple Query params are available for filtering check Query params.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Id of the User.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Collection.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of records thatis required.Default value is 100.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of records that are required to skip. Default value is 0

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order

application/json.name: thirdCollection21
application/json.description: Fist Collection to be used in BitPack.me

post.description:
Save tags to be used in NFTs.

The tag has to be comma separated.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Name of the tags. Comma separated.

get.description: Fetch User Info based on Given ID

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: ID of the User

patch.description: Update Username and Display name of the User.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username. Unique in the system for each user.

parameters.name: display_name
parameters.description: Display Name of the User.

parameters.name: photoUrl
parameters.description: Url of the profile picsture of the logged in user.

errors.msg: Username or Display Name is required

post.description: Wallet ID is obtained by the `GET /l1addresses` call

parameters.name: walletAddress
parameters.description: An arbitrary address on L1. Either this or walletId is required

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: This is used along with walletAddress. Ignored if passed with walletId

parameters.name: nftId
parameters.description: The NFT ID that is to be transferred.

post.description: Used to generate the signature URL for cloudinary secure upload from cloud side

parameters.name: nftId
parameters.description: The ID of the NFT that is being bought

post.description:
Chain ID is an enum defined as

``` typescript
export enum Chains {
  Sol,  // 0
  Eth,  // 1
  Polygon  // 2
}

```

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to be added

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Integer ID of the chain

post.description: Refresh Token API. Need to send previous token and refresh token. If both are correct it will generate a new token and refresh token for the FE to use. A new Refresh token will be generated. this new refresh token will be used to fetch a new token.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Token which was received previously.

parameters.name: refresh_token
parameters.description: Refresh Token which was received previously.

patch.description: Update NFT to update for sale or add a message to it for other users to see.

parameters.name: forSale
parameters.description: For Sale flag.

application/json.title: Nft11
application/json.message: This is my NFT. Please buy!
